Messi beat Haaland and Kylian Mbappe to win the 2023 Ballon d'Or as he bagged the eighth award of … [+1768 chars]

articles.title: ‘You are free to humiliate yourself, do not drag us along’: Wasim Akram slams Hasan Raza for claiming India is getting ‘special balls’ during World Cup - OpIndia
articles.description: Akram went on to describe how the balls are chosen before a cricket match. Akram also asserted that Pakistan bowlers should rather focus on learning how Indian bowlers have improved over the years. | OpIndia News
articles.content: Former Pakistani cricketer Hasan Raza has been at the receiving end of criticism and trolling over his bizarre claim that ICC is giving “different and suspicious” balls to Indian bowlers in World Cup… [+4287 chars]
